definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: These heterocyclic amines and some other carcinogens too are very often found in meat products.
sentences.chinese: 在肉类产品中也会经常发现多环胺和其它一些致癌物。

sentences.english: Reports in the formula to point to, hydrolyzed vegetable protein may release the carcinogens.
sentences.chinese: 报道指，配方中的水解植物蛋白质有可能释放致癌物。

sentences.english: The airborne carcinogens are in the atmosphere as absorbed matter on soot particles.
sentences.chinese: 空气传播的致癌物在大气中是烟炱粒子上吸附的物质。

sentences.english: The enzymes detoxify the carcinogens, and are among the strongest cancer fighting substances available.
sentences.chinese: 生化酶可分解致癌物质，并在最强抗癌物质中使用。

sentences.english: Benzopyrene is a common high activity indirect carcinogen.
sentences.chinese: 苯并芘是一种常见的高活性间接致癌物。

sentences.english: Both snuff and chewing tobacco contain deadly carcinogens.
sentences.chinese: 鼻烟和口嚼烟都含有致癌物质。

sentences.english: Frying in vegetable oil results in carcinogenic substances due to burned oil.
sentences.chinese: 在煮过的植物油中煎炸东西，会产生致癌物质。

sentences.english: Chicken bottom contain carcinogenic substance, don't eat well.
sentences.chinese: 鸡屁股含有致癌物，不要吃较好。

sentences.english: Cankered material can produce effluvial carcinogen aldehyde . 2.
sentences.chinese: 腐烂的物质可以产生恶臭的致癌物质乙醛。

sentences.english: Vegetables do not form heterocyclic amines or any other carcinogens during cooking.
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜在烹饪过程中不会形成杂环胺或者其它致癌物。

sentences.english: He does say the carcinogen cadmium is no longer in use.
sentences.chinese: 不过他说，致癌物质镉已经不再使用。

sentences.english: Sudan red is believed to cause cancer.
sentences.chinese: 苏丹红被认为是一种致癌物质。

sentences.english: Nitrites and nitrates have long been recognized as potent carcinogens.
sentences.chinese: 亚硝酸盐和硝酸盐被认为是强力致癌物。

sentences.english: Formaldehyde is a suspected carcinogen linked to nasal and lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 甲醛一直被怀疑是导致鼻癌及肺癌的致癌物质。

sentences.english: Acrylamide is considered a possible human carcinogen.
sentences.chinese: 据认为，丙烯酰胺可能是一种人类致癌物。

sentences.english: K. Sudan red is believed to cause cancer.
sentences.chinese: 苏丹红被认为是一种致癌物质。

definition: Aspergillus flavus (fungus typically found on crops)
Aspergillus flavus (fungus typically found on crops)
